senses.sense_definition: The primordial giant in Norse mythology who is the ancestor of all frost giants and from whose body the world was created.

examples.text: In ancient legends, the gods used the flesh of <w>Ymir</w> to form the earth.
The frost giant <w>Ymir</w> is a central figure in the story of creation.

senses.sense_definition: A small retrograde irregular moon of the planet Saturn.

examples.text: Astronomers have identified <w>Ymir</w> as one of the many moons orbiting Saturn.
The orbit of <w>Ymir</w> is distant and takes a long time to complete.
